techmeme.title: Apple reports Q3 revenue from Services, which includes App Store, Apple TV+, and Apple Music, rose 14% YoY to $24.21B, vs. $23.96B estimated, an all-time record (Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter)
Roku reports Q2 revenue up 14% YoY to $968.2M vs. $935.3M estimated, a net loss of $33.95M vs. $107.6M in Q2 2023, and 83.6M streaming households, up 2M from Q1 (Lucas Manfredi/The Wrap)
Block reports Q2 revenue up 11% YoY to $6.16B, vs. $6.28B est., Square profit up 15% to $923M, Cash App profit up 23% to $1.3B, and raises its FY 2024 guidance (MacKenzie Sigalos/CNBC)
Apple Q3 revenue: iPhone down 1% YoY to $39.30B, Mac up 2% YoY to $7.01B, iPad up 24% YoY to $7.16B, and Wearables, Home, and Accessories down 2% YoY to $8.10B (Kif Leswing/CNBC)
Amazon reports Q2 ad revenue up 20% YoY to $12.77B, vs. $13B estimated (Todd Spangler/Variety)
